mapper.update: update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_id_create = #{userIdCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIGINT}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pic_id = #{picId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, live_address = #{liveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hobby = #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
